problem.markdown:
1. Which type of thermal equation is applicable for EDM/WEDM or? ( ) steady state equation ( ) transient equation (x) Both of the above ( ) none of the above
2. Which type of heat source is used in Electrical Discharge Machining (EDM)? ( ) continuous ( ) pulsed ( ) Both of the above (x) None of the above
3. The energy source is used by ( ) Dielectric (x) Tool ( ) Work piece ( ) All of the above
4. Can the material removal rate be derived form a single pulse heat source and frequency of spark? ( ) Yes (x) No ( ) Difficult to estimate ( ) Consideration of effective spark energy
5. Which of the following thermal properties may not be considered while evaluating the material removal rate? (x) Dielectric fluid ( ) Thermal Conductivity ( ) Evaporation temperature ( ) Melting temperature
problem.p: 1. Which type of thermal equation is applicable for EDM/WEDM or?
2. Which type of heat source is used in Electrical Discharge Machining (EDM)?
